attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: In all seriousness this app is terrible. Once I opened it it had me put in a bunch of information such as email and phone number. Suddenly I was flooded by an on going string of emails and texts. It was so frustrating. Then the app kept crashing when I tried to use it. Think twice before downloading this app if you want to save yourself from the constant gross notifications.  🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: This app ruined my life
attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app my skin turned to a dark Cheeto orange like I had been bathing in hot Cheeto water for three days straight got a tan that lasted 36 hours strait and I started sweating profusely, I was sweating so much and I was so ugly I was cast out of my home and I was sent to jail because nobody in this world should be so ugly, on my way to jail I was laughed at by children and I maid all of the inmates cry. I was sweating so much that I turned the jail into a flamin hot Cheeto colored swimming pool.

attributes.title: WORST THING EVER GET. GIVES YOU VIRUS
attributes.review: I OPENED THE APP AND THERE WAS 2 LINK. ONE LEAD TO CHILD PORNOGRAPHY ANDTHE OTHER went directly to a website where you can donate money to kill all women and hunt homosexuals. It was insane. Then they asked me where I lived so I gave my address but they CAME TO MY HOUSE AND broke done my door. They grabbed my baby and boiled her in front of me because I didn’t claim my free yard sign that WASNT free I had to donate 20 dollars. They then imprissoned me and sold my wife to the neonatzis. I would NOT RECOMEND THIS. Oh and they cooked my dog alive and ate him
attributes.userName: just a tid bit for ya

attributes.title: Typical
attributes.review: First thing this app wants from me as soon as I opened it is my phone number. Very rude umm you haven’t even asked me what my name is yet? Next thing I know it’s asking me for my snap and location, which I gave it only because I was bored and planned on ghosting it later. I get a snap at 1am that says “you up?” and then it sends me the saddest looking dick pic I’ve ever seen in my life. Needless to say... BLOCKED. I just want an app that wants to get to know me first!!

attributes.title: Gave me TRAUMA
attributes.review: I downloaded this because I wanted to know who the strange orange man is who is apparently our president. Anyways I opened the app and GIRL... there was a TEENY WEENIE IT WAS SO SMALL AND UGLY!!!!! He was getting a spray tan🤢🤢 He's really trying to turn himself even more ugly isn’t he :( Anyways I puked instantly and I couldn’t stop for two whole hours. I went to the hospital to see what was wrong and they said that I could’ve died!!!! Please never download this app is so traumatizing and disgusting. DO NOT SUPPORT TRUMP AND HIS LITTLW BITTY TEENY TINY WEENIE!!!!!

attributes.title: No thanks!
attributes.review: First off when I downloaded and opened the app, my phone just restarted automatically and when my phone turned on a nude photo of dwayne Johnson and the rock making out popped up!!!! 🤬😡🥵🤯 I was in agony just looking at the photo! Anyways after opening the app I received a personal text from a random number telling me that they’re going to start stalking people who download the official trump app!!! No thank you!

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: Wow. Where do I begin. This is the worst app on the market, which kinda makes sense considering who it’s about. But anyways I would only get this app if you are a white supremacist, racist, say that “all lives matter” but are okay with children in cages, believe that women have no rights to their body, or don’t want to wear a mask because it “violates your freedom”. If you still think you should download this app, please re-evaluate your morals!! Have a good day!

attributes.title: My Rating
attributes.review: i downloaded this app about a month ago and i’ve been having nothing but complications with it. it always tells me to pay a fee to the Apple Store JUST so i can access it. it has only caused my family and i stress and has caused me to nearly go broke by having to pay fees!! i thought this app was free. genuinely disappointed on the way this app was set up, and i do not recommend downloading it.

attributes.title: Orange faces
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a virus and took days to download. The only thing I could look at on this app was oranges. I was very terrified and it traumatized my 3 year old cousin. I would give this app 0 stars but the minimum is 1. The apple store needs to delete this app immediately. Also this app gives terrible and false information. This app makes me lose brain cells. Anyways my turtle died looking at this app. The president is and 🍊 🤡. 🧚‍♀️💫❤️🖖🏾😌🙈😈😼😜👁👄👁✊🏾
